prolog:
:- dynamic parent/2, ancestor/2, cousin/2, uncle/2.

parent(alice, bob).
parent(alice, claire).
parent(bob, david).
parent(claire, emily).
parent(david, frank).
parent(emily, george).

ancestor(X, Y) :- parent(X, Y).
ancestor(X, Y) :- parent(X, Z), ancestor(Z, Y).

sibling(X, Y) :- parent(Z, X), parent(Z, Y), X \= Y.

cousin(X, Y) :-
    parent(A, X),
    parent(B, Y),
    sibling(A, B).

uncle(X, Y) :-
    parent(P, Y),
    sibling(X, P),
    male(X).

male(bob).
male(david).
male(frank).
male(george).
male(john).
